about_the_game:
Immortal-Paradise
Game type: Action Game, RPG Game, Advanture Game.

Background
It is a game about the future. Artificial Intelligent take care of all big city, the consciousness of human uploaded to the central supercomputer. The main characters come from the countryside, so they still get the bodies. Their job is to find a way to communicate with human consciousness in the big city. Figure out the truth - Are they really happy in the past centuries; Is the control computer a really "paradise" for the consciousness of the human being! If not, the left human will format and destroy the "Paradise". The left human will correct their civilization way. Players have to fight with different AI soldiers when they adventure in a different part of the city.

Feature: Game Mechanic（Fighting system）are the amazing part.
1.工 shape fighting system.
Attack method: Horizontal Slash, Low Slash, Vertical Slash, Kick
Defence method: High Block, Low Block, Dodge.
Low Slash beats High Block;
Vertical Slash beats Low Block;
Horizontal Slash beats Dodge;
Kick beat both Blocks.

2. One Button show multiple abilities based on stance.
Examples:
X = Push Kick
Shift X = Run Kick
WW X = Dash Kick
Space X = Air Kick
Hilding X = Kick Down

3. Crowd control：
Stunned; Prone; Knocked Up; Grabed; Staggered.
When Aerial Cleave(Space+2) meets prone opponent = Tons of damage;
When Uppercut(ww+1/1) meets stunned opponent = Knocked Up
The player will find out more fighting strategies in the game tour.

4. Details:
LB(Mouse left Button) basic attacks can be used 3 times before abilities. During LB basic attacks, Pressing the A， S， D key could switch attack angles to break defence.

Finally：
If you want to play some real Action game rather than a shooting game, this is your best choice. You can enjoy the amazing Action game mechanic.
If you want to enjoy a storyline. sorry, it is not a good game for you on this version. I am still working on story expression.
